item.title: Thumbs up and Thumbs down pattern
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Collecting user feedback is importance for improving the accuracy and relevance of responses. One simple yet powerful feedback mechanism is the thumbs up and thumbs down system.

item.title: Design feedback mechanism for LLM applications
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Getting consistent and accurate answers from LLMs is a major challenge. One effective strategy to address this challenge is incorporating a robust feedback mechanism within the app to collect user feedback.
